rules.description: whenever an ASC opportunity record type is changed to 'closed' then the 'tl-mbr' checbox is unchecked
This workflow evaluates close dates on all opportunities for US Recon and Surgical Businesses

rules.fullName: Dollars left on the table for PO

rules.formula: AND( OR( RecordType.Id == '012C0000000Ga1g', RecordType.Id == '012C0000000QEmM', RecordType.Id == '012C0000000GaIO', RecordType.Id == '012800000002ReS', RecordType.Id == '012C0000000Ga2F', RecordType.Id == '012C0000000GZza', RecordType.Id == '012C0000000YQrE', RecordType.Id == '0123b000000Qfrz'), OR(NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Lost'))), Top_150__c==TRUE)

rules.fullName: Email notifications for Opportunity close date

criteriaItems.value: US Knee,US Gel-One,US Sports Medicine,US Extremities,US Foot and Ankle,US Hip,US Biologics,US Trauma

rules.description: This work Flow is associated with Push Counter
Knee_Auto_Update_Amount : amount = competitive Units x ASP
Increment the Push Counter field by 1
rules.formula: IF( CloseDate > PRIORVALUE( CloseDate ), IF (MONTH(CloseDate) <> MONTH(PRIORVALUE( CloseDate )) , TRUE, FALSE), FALSE)

AND( OR( RecordType.Id =='0123b000000IKKm', RecordType.Id =='012C0000000YQqa', RecordType.Id =='0123b000000IKKr'), NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Won"),ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost"))), (ABS(MONTH(Credit_Review_Date__c) + (12*(YEAR(Credit_Review_Date__c)-YEAR(TODAY()))) - MONTH(TODAY()))>=6) )

rules.fullName: Send alert for ROSA Oppty Contract Expiration
rules.formula:
AND( OR( RecordType.Id =='0123b000000IKKm', RecordType.Id =='012C0000000YQqa', RecordType.Id =='0123b000000IKKr' ), (ABS(MONTH(Contract_End_Date__c) + (12*(YEAR(Contract_End_Date__c)- YEAR(TODAY()))) - MONTH(TODAY()))<=3), OR( ISPICKVAL(Deal_Type_Surgical__c,"ROSA+"), ISPICKVAL(Deal_Type_Surgical__c,"ROSA+ from Placement"), ISPICKVAL(Deal_Type_Surgical__c,"Placement"), ISPICKVAL(Deal_Type_Surgical__c,"ROSA ID"), ISPICKVAL(Deal_Type_Surgical__c,"ROSA ID from Placement") )
)

rules.fullName: Update ROSA Knee Installation field for Closed and Closed - Placement Return
Update checkbox when ROSA Oppty is cloned
rules.formula: AND( OR( RecordType.Id =='0123b000000IKKm', RecordType.Id =='012C0000000YQqa', RecordType.Id =='0123b000000IKKr' ), ISCLONE() )
